quest.name: Getting Even with Garlemald
journal: Glaumunt would like to aid in your mission to rescue the captured Scions.

Prior to launching your rescue mission, Glaumunt recommends that you first ascertain your comrades' presence at Castrum Centri. He tells you of a drainage pipe that leads from the stronghold's command tower and down into the southwestern corner of the adjoining swampland called the Tangle. Find the pipe and investigate.
You have put down all the chigoes that issued forth from the drainage pipe. Take their place within and listen to what sounds may be heard.
You have heard enough to confirm that your comrades are indeed being held at Castrum Centri. Bear word back to Revenant's Toll, where the Scions await.
You return to Revenant's Toll and report all you have learned to Alphinaud. Glad for your tidings, he bids you speak with Cid for the details of the rescue mission.
Ever enthused, Glaumunt is currently looking into the procurement of a suit of magitek armor. In the meantime, Cid requires your assistance for some preparation of his own.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: ...So you have friends at Castrum Centri what want for rescue. That Slafborn knows me too well─aye, you can count on my help.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: I've got a score to settle with the imperials, an' I never pass on an opportunity to get back at the whoresons. But enough about me, let's talk strategy.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: Rescuin' folk from captivity's right delicate business. A single oversight─just one little blunder─an' it's all over. You can't leave any room for uncertainty.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: For starters, you need to confirm beyond the shadow of a doubt that your friends're where you think they are. You don't want to risk your neck only to discover they've been moved elsewhere. But how can you find out, you ask? By followin' these instructions:

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: If you approach Centri from the east, you'll see a swampland to your left called the Tangle. Get in there, never mind all the morbols, an' navigate your way to the southwestern corner.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: You'll come upon some drainage pipes comin' down from the stronghold. Don't ask me how I know, but one o' them leads back up to the command tower. If you listen closely, might be as you can eavesdrop on some o' the happenin's within.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: Once we know for certain your friends're there, we'll move to the next stage o' the operation. Now, get goin', and godsspeed!

dialogue.name: DUMMY
dialogue.text: (Examine drainage pip. Four chigres pop.)

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The faint sound of conversation echoes down the pipe.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Collected Voice-)What of the captive? Does she still refuse to speak?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Youthful Voice-)She may as well be a deaf-mute for all the information we've gotten out of her.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Gruff Voice-)The others aren't much better. The Elezen gets on my nerves most of all. Every time he opens his mouth, it's only to spout gibberish.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Youthful Voice-)I do wonder, why is the tribunus so obsessed with this Minfilia woman?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Gruff Voice-)They say she possesses some mystical power. Something we Garleans don't have.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Youthful Voice-)Mystical power? Like the kind the beastmen use?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Gruff Voice-)How am I supposed to bloody know? If you're so curious, why don't you ask the tribunus yourself?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Youthful Voice-)As well try to tumble her! I like my head where it is, thank you very much!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Collected Voice-)Our break is over. Best we get back to our stations.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The footfalls grow fainter until all is silent.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: 'Tis good to see you again, Forename. I'm given to understand you have conducted some reconnaissance. Tell me, what were you able to learn?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...So Minfilia and the others are indeed at Castrum Centri! Their presence thus confirmed, we may proceed with the mission. While you were afield, Cid took the liberty of devising a plan of action. Pray have the details from him.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Good work, Forename. As Alphinaud has already told you, we've plotted out a course for the rescue.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: The gist of it is unchanged: we disguise ourselves as imperial soldiers and infiltrate the stronghold.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Glaumunt is looking into ways to procure a suit of magitek armor. In the meantime, I need your assistance for some preparation of my own.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Minfilia and the others are counting on us, Forename. Let's not keep them waiting any longer than necessary!

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: A maddening buzzing fills your ears!
